title: Free HiveÂ® for everyone, forever!
subtitle: No ads, no subscriptions; but open-source and passion.
about: We are a community project and we believe everyone should have access to a free, world-class hive platform.We rely on support from people like you to make it possible. If you enjoy using hivegame, please consider supporting us by donating.

where_does_money_go.question: Where does money go?
where_does_money_go.answer: First of all, the server, then our developers.

features_for_patrons.question: Are some features reserved for Patrons?
features_for_patrons.answer: No, because hivegame is entirely free, forever, and for everyone. That's a promise. You do get a ðŸ‘‘ though.

small_team_blurb: We are a small team, so your support makes a huge difference!
